name: Agent Inbox
description: Centralized inbox for agents to view and manage customer conversations in real time.

tabs.name: Description
tabs.content: The Agent Inbox component allows support agents to view, filter, and respond to customer messages in a unified interface. Includes real-time updates and easy customer selection.

tabs.name: Component Details
tabs.content: Accessible from the main navigation. Supports desktop and mobile. Integrates with ticket and customer management features.

tabs.name: Description
tabs.content: The Genesys Cloud CX Agent Performance Stats is an embeddable component that allows an agent to view their real-time performance stats.

tabs.name: Component Details
tabs.content: Add component via Lightning App Builder to Lightning page or Utility bar.

name: Queue Activation
description: Activate and manage customer service queues.

tabs.name: Description
tabs.content: The Genesys Cloud CX Queue Activation and Stats is an embeddable component that displays queue statistics.

tabs.name: Component Details
tabs.content: Add component via Lightning App Builder to Lightning page or Utility bar.

name: Call Controls
description: Control and manage live calls efficiently.

tabs.name: Description
tabs.content: This component allows an agent to view and interact with active and incoming conversations.

tabs.name: Component Details
tabs.content: Add component via Lightning App Builder to Lightning page or Utility bar.
